last_episode_to_air.name: School's Out for Summer
last_episode_to_air.overview: In the Season 1 finale, Craig looks forward to a Nasty Delicious summer tour, but soon considers ditching those plans, along with his brother, friends and students, when the band Earth, Wind and Fire present him with a tempting offer. Meanwhile, Samir feels guilty about seeing Ashleigh at her stripper job.

name: Mr. Robinson
overview: Centers on a rough-edged musician Craig, who's adjusting to his new life as a music teacher in a big-city middle school where he encounters teacher politics and the temptations of single moms.

episodes.name: Pilot
episodes.overview: When Craig decides to take a substitute music teacher job just to win over an ex, he ends up connecting with the students and the faculty.

episodes.name: Flesh for Fantasy
episodes.overview: Principal Taylor's old groupie habits resurface when Craig, hoping to win a record deal for Nasty Delicious, invites a rock legend she once dated to speak at school. Meanwhile, Victoria advises the other teachers on a good investment, but their spending habits get out of control.

episodes.name: Ain't Nothin' But a Hound Dog
episodes.overview: Craig asks Jimmy to move in with the hope that he'll push the sloppy and jobless Ben to become a better roommate. Meanwhile, Ashleigh and Samir do some detective work to track down Supervisor Dalton's dog that Principal Taylor lost.

episodes.name: Love the One You're With
episodes.overview: Craig organizes a night out with the teachers in hopes of getting some quality time with Victoria, but then a chance meeting with Victoria's friend takes him on a different course. Meanwhile, Jimmy suffers an existential crisis that leads him to make a documentary titled "Afro-Disiac."

episodes.name: Can't Buy Me Love
episodes.overview: Craig hopes that a fund-raising auction will save his job and provide him with the perfect opportunity to make his move on Victoria, who is considering following her boyfriend to New York. Meanwhile, Samir tries to let Ashleigh know that he wants to be more than just friends.

episodes.name: School's Out for Summer
episodes.overview: In the Season 1 finale, Craig looks forward to a Nasty Delicious summer tour, but soon considers ditching those plans, along with his brother, friends and students, when the band Earth, Wind and Fire present him with a tempting offer. Meanwhile, Samir feels guilty about seeing Ashleigh at her stripper job.
